Class Raytracer

    • processing.core.PApplet
      • Raytracer

  • public class Raytracer
extends processing.core.PApplet

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      (package private) class  Raytracer.Color
      Represents an RGB color parameter for the purposes of JSON serialization only.
      (package private) class  Raytracer.DirectionalLight
      Represents a light source which illuminates the entire scene uniformly from one direction.
      class  Raytracer.FloatParameter
      A dynamically generated GUI control that controls a single float value.
      (package private) class  Raytracer.JSONSerializable
      Base class for all classes which can be saved into a JSON file.
      (package private) class  Raytracer.JSONTypeMismatchException
      Thrown when the type indicated in the JSONObject's "type" key does not match the expected type.
      (package private) class  Raytracer.Light
      Represents a generic light source that can illuminate scene objects.
      class  Raytracer.ListParameter<T extends Raytracer.Tweakable>
      A dynamically generated GUI element that manages an ArrayList of Raytracer.Tweakables and their individual GUI controls.
      class  Raytracer.ParameterControl
      Base class for a dynamically generated GUI control.
      (package private) class  Raytracer.Plane
      Represents a one-sided infinite plane.
      (package private) class  Raytracer.PointLight
      Represents a light source that radiates light outward in all directions from a single point.
      (package private) class  Raytracer.Ray
      Represents a ray that can be traced.
      (package private) class  Raytracer.Scene
      Contains all the data necessary to render a scene.
      (package private) class  Raytracer.SceneObject
      Represents any solid object or surface that can be hit by a ray.
      (package private) class  Raytracer.Sphere
      Represents a sphere.
      (package private) static interface  Raytracer.Tweakable
      An object that can be an entry in a Raytracer.ListParameter dropdown list.
      class  Raytracer.Tweaker
      Manages the "Tweaker" window and all the GUI controls that are drawn onto it.
      (package private) class  Raytracer.Vector2
      Represents a 2D Vector.
      (package private) class  Raytracer.Vector3
      Represents a 3D Vector.
      class  Raytracer.Vector3Parameter
      A dynamically generated GUI control that controls a Vector3 value.

      • getPrimaryRay

        private Raytracer.Ray getPrimaryRay​(int imageX,
                                    int imageY)
        Creates a primary ray from the camera origin, through a specified pixel on the image plane. (See Fig. 1 in the design document)
        Parameters:
        imageX - x coordinate of pixel on the image plane.
        imageY - y coordinate of pixel on the image plane.
        Returns:
        a Ray with origin at the camera origin and direction pointing through the specified pixel on the image plane.

        public void saveScene​(java.io.File file)
        Callback for the Save Scene button. This is called after the user selects a file or closes the file selection dialog.
        Parameters:
